Awards, honors & publications

What others are saying about Stefan

First award title here

Second award title there

Toyota and 12 other members of the hydrogen council are betting $10.7 billion on hydrogen. In 2016, Toyota formalized its relationship with HydrogeNXT and signed a letter of support which recognizes how Toyota and HydrogeNXT can help each other get to a world beyond gasoline.

From the article: "Toyota Motor Corp. and four of its biggest car-making peers are joining oil and gas giants including Royal Dutch Shell Plc and Total SA with plans to invest a combined 10 billion euros ($10.7 billion) in hydrogen-related products within five years."

Read full article here in Bloomberg.

What we do

Fill your fuel cell electric car in 3 minutes or provide resilient power for your business with hydrogen.

Hydrogen for Electric Cars

We create clean hydrogen using domestic natural gas and biogas. Power up with HydrogeNXT, and you'll feel good about driving again.

Watch Zero Emissions Video

Cure for drivers' range anxiety

Our patented mobile app reservation system means you're assured hydrogen at our stations. Say adios, so long, sayonara to range anxiety.

Watch Reservation Video

Resilient power supply

Hydrogen fuel cells provide cost-effective, resilient power for data centers, cell phone towers, and offices. With HydrogeNXT, we'll all get there faster.
